member.Summary: Gets or sets the playback volume 0 to 1 where 0 is no-sound and 1 is full volume.

member.name: P:MauiAudio.INativeAudioService.Muted
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback volume muted. false means not mute; true means mute.

member.name: P:MauiAudio.INativeAudioService.Balance
member.Summary: Gets or sets the balance left/right: -1 is 100% left : 0% right, 1 is 100% right : 0% left, 0 is equal volume left/right.
